Html:
I've noticed that nobody from Governor has responded to any issue here since January. I don't expect an instant response as this isn't paid support but anything longer than a week will be of little use to people.

Please Governor, pick up your email and respond.

Gus

Hi Gus

Apologies for the lack of activity and feedback from our side. We've picked up support on the package again, and also released a few new versions.

I hope you will find these useful.

Best regards,
Rigardt
Governor Technology
